, such as shifting procurement or adopting new policies on foreign exchange, Sergio Marchionne said. "Any knee-jerk reaction to currency moves can force a readjustment and that can be quite expensive," Sergio Marchionne said. For Chrysler, it is a great thing to the extent that other currencies have experienced a strong position relative to the US dollar. For European operations, "it's a bind," he said. Fiat has significant sales in Brazil and is working to help Chrysler expand its business there and other markets. Fiat

Bernie Sanders , the Department of Defense disclosed that it paid$ 285 billion over a three-year span to hundreds of military contractors that defrauded the Pentagon during the same period.
